rationale: 'pathogenic' is part of the technical term HPAI.
statement_text: This [crossing a new frontier] is because the pathogenic avian influenza (HPAI) has just crossed a new frontier, a new study reported.

rationale: No high-potency verb, potent metaphor, critical alert phrase, superlative + harm noun, or intensifier + harm noun found.
statement_text: This [crossing a new frontier] is because the pathogenic avian influenza (HPAI) has just crossed a new frontier, a new study reported.
